description: Increases all party members' Crit. Rate by 24%, lasting for 30m. (This effect only applies to your own Resonator(s) in Co-op Mode)
bgDescription: Gently simmer the rice over low heat, adding a few delicate flower petals for flavor. As it begins to lightly boil, this simple yet sweet dish becomes a favorite snack for Taoqi when relaxing at home. With each slow sip, it seems to wash away the accumulated fatigue of the day, leaving a refreshing feeling in its wake.
